networksession-desc: Adds a SessionProvider based on configured IP address and secret token
networksession-only-api-request: NetworkSession authorization is only valid for API requests.
networksession-only-https: NetworkSession authorization is only valid for HTTPS requests.
networksession-invalid-config-ip-ranges: The <var>ip_ranges</var> configured in NetworkSessionProvider must be an array.
networksession-invalid-config-token: The <var>token</var> configured in NetworkSessionProvider must be a string.
networksession-invalid-config-username: The <var>username</var> configured in NetworkSessionProvider must be a string.
networksession-invalid-config-multiple-m: Multiple configured users matched the request, but only one is allowed.
networksession-no-token-match: The provided NetworkSession authorization token failed to authenticate.
